title: Ripple: The Billion-Dollar Metaverse is Coming to XRP Ledger with DeLux Launch
description: XRP Ledger (XRPL) is set to host a billion-dollar metaverse, the DeLux Network, as projects deployed on the network grow.  In its 2023 roadmap, TDN would conduct a token presale in three categories – bronze, silver, and gold.  Ripple’s XRP Ledger (XRPL) has become the go-to place for most renowned crypto projects. The latest top [...]
